title: Scarlett Moffatt moves in with policeman boyfriend
text:

Scarlett Moffatt has put love-life disasters behind her and moved in with her policeman boyfriend.

The reality TV star this week celebrated her 29th birthday on a romantic trip to Venice with Scott Dobinson and revealed they are living together.

Scarlett said: “It’s so new we are still laughing and smiling about it.”

It was a far cry from her 27th birthday, ruined by her break-up with her long-term partner, hairdresser Luke Crodden.

(Image: instagram.com/scarlettmoffatt)

The Gogglebox favourite said the pair had fallen into the “friends zone” as Scarlett’s career went into overdrive after winning I’m a Celebrity in 2016.

She was left heartbroken by her split from fitness instructor Lee Wilkinson last year and is keen not to jinx things with Scott.

Scarlett – just named brand ambassador for deals website Wowcher – said: “I think he’s the one but I feel, whenever I say that in public, I doom my life!”

(Image: (Channel 4 images must not be altered or manipulated in any way) CHANNEL 4 PICTURE PUBLICITY 124 HORSEFERRY ROAD LONDON SW1P 2TX)

Now she is starring in Channel 4 show The British Tribe Next Door, which sees Scarlett and family staying with the Himba people in the Namibian desert.

It starts on Tuesday at 9.15pm.
